name: Design Delivery with Zeplin
description:
Add order to the chaos:

Learn best practices for handoff and create a smooth design ops workflow with Zeplin.


This guide walks through some developer focused handoff workflows that will facilitate collaboration and help you create a more inclusive workspace for the entire team.


Design in peace while knowing that your team has an organized source of truth.


Made with ❤︎ by Zeplin


If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us at support@zeplin.io.


Resources:

Install the Zeplin Plugin for Figma﻿

Get Started with Zeplin
